name.ja: <ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>獣<rt>じゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>バルバロス

summoning_condition.en: You can Normal Summon this card in Attack Position without Tributing or by Tributing 3 face-up EARTH Attribute monsters. If Summoned without Tributing, its original ATK becomes 1900.

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card by Tributing 3 monsters the above way.

effect.en: Destroy all face-up cards on your opponent's field.
